title: 5 rugby half-time snacks to keep game day festivities going strong
text:
5 rugby half-time snacks to keep game day festivities going strong It’s the Rugby World Cup time and even those sidelined back in South Africa can participate with these five half-time snack recipes. by: Bianca Jones | 17 Oct 2019





Even couch coaches need the right fuel to keep them going all game long, and nothing’s more draining than the stress of a last-minute penalty try for the opposition right before half-time.

Here’s our top pick of recipes to keep you fueled when your blood starts boiling:

Grubber-worthy beer-and-bacon nuts with fried olives

Spicy lime chicken wings

Chip Kick cheesy bacon fritter

Halloumi, za’atar and honey parcel

Scrum-licious sweet treats: jeweled celebratory game day rocky road

Couch-coach life can be tough, but someone’s got to do it!

ALSO SEE... Watch: How to snack like the Dutch
description: It’s the Rugby World Cup time and even those sidelined back in South Africa can participate with these five half-time snack recipes.
